name: Gunman Steve
description:
Join Steve and his Birdie and gun down countless evil choppers and ships. Dodge enemies and restore peace to the ocean.

Control

Press "Space" to jump.

Use mouse to aim and Left Mouse Button to shoot.

That's It.

Credit

All art assets were made by Tanmay Sarker
